feed.title: North Mountain (Cape Breton) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , North Mountain (Cape Breton)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:18 PM AST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Mountain 11:00 PM AST Wednesday 15 February 2023
Temperature: -1.0°C
Humidity: 70 %
Dewpoint: -5.9°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Rain showers beginning after midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming south 20 this evening. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Showers. High 7.
entry.summary: Showers ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 5 mm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming west 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 15 February 2023
